bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with bi yuan 鼻淵 , nasal deep-source [outflow]. Pu ji fang 普濟方 卷 57: 川 芎防風散，治積年腦瀉秘方 , “Powder with chuan xiong and fang feng : a secret recipe to cure brain outflow that has lasted for several years”. It was believed that the brain is the “sea of marrow”, sui hai 髓海 . It stores and there must be no efflux. Only if evil heat rises to attack the brain, and when subsequently the yang qi is no longer stable, the liquid marrow flows down into the nose resulting in turbid snivel that does not end. Hence the brain is like a deep source of water, with “brain outflow” as alternative designations of “nasal deep source [outflow]”.
